Name: Revenge: Rhobar's myth
About the game: A MAGICAL WORLD FULL OF WITCHCRAFT AND WIZARDRY AWAITS YOU! Join the worlds best wizard academy and embark on an exciting, mysterious journey. Learn 4 different and mighty spells to change the world around you, experience a breathtaking plot about the lost wizard Rhobar or challenge yourself in the freeroam mode! Combine the use of the 4 unique Spells Auraco, Luminos, Terramus and Ignis so solve magical puzzles and find the ideal route in the Spell-Challenges. Set your own highscore and rise the bar for other wizards to a new level. FEATURES: Gameplay specifically designed for PC 2 game modes - Freeroam & Story Open world experience with no loading pauses Use combinations of your spells to solve magic puzzles Modern graphics by Unreal Engine 3 and high resolution Textures Epic Soundtrack by Kevin MacLeod DRM free & only free DLCs 4k Support
